segments.text: Hello . Thank you for calling Spend Mart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this the Customer Service Desk ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought a sweater from your store a week ago . It says size 12 . But actually , it is a size 10 . Can I exchange it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have the receipt with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to apologize for the problem . Please come down with your receipt and sweater to exchange it for the size you want .
segments.speaker: S1
